briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Tolerability Study of Fluval AB Novo Suspension for Injection for Children and Adolescents

armGroups.label: Age group 1: children (3-11 years)
interventionNames: Biological: Vaccination with Fluval AB Novo suspension for injection, half dose of a single intramuscular dose (0.25 ml)

armGroups.label: Age group 2: adolescents (12-18 years)
interventionNames: Biological: Vaccination with Fluval AB Novo suspension for injection, single intramuscular dose (0.5 ml)

interventions.name: Vaccination with Fluval AB Novo suspension for injection, half dose of a single intramuscular dose (0.25 ml)
otherNames: Fluval AB Novo suspension for injection

interventions.name: Vaccination with Fluval AB Novo suspension for injection, single intramuscular dose (0.5 ml)

outcomeMeasures.title: Increase in Geometric Mean Titre Ratio, A/H1N1 Strain
outcomeMeasures.description:
Ratio of Day 0 and Day 21-28 antihaemagglutination inhibition titres

Requirement: \> 2.5

outcomeMeasures.title: Increase in Geometric Mean Titre Ratio, A/H3N2 Strain
outcomeMeasures.description:
Ratio of Day 0 and Day 21-28 antihaemagglutination inhibition titres

Requirement: \> 2.5

outcomeMeasures.title: Increase in Geometric Mean Titre Ratio, B Strain
outcomeMeasures.description:
Ratio of Day 0 and Day 21-28 antihaemagglutination inhibition titres

Requirement: \> 2.5

outcomeMeasures.title: Seroconversion, A/H1N1 Strain
outcomeMeasures.description:
Proportion of subjects seroconverted or had a significant increase in titres

Requirement: \> 40 %

outcomeMeasures.description:
Proportion of subjects seroconverted or had a significant increase in titres

Requirement: \> 40 %
